entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: S 12 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
